narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Paterson Public Schools is a Local Education Agency (LEA) provider based in Paterson, NJ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $62.1M in Medicaid payments across 412K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $62.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
